data.name: EmailSending_ServiceLimitError
data.value: The email could not be sent at this time, because the service limits set by the email supplier has been reached. Please try again in an hour.

data.name: EmailSending_Exception
data.value: An error occurred while attempting to send the email. Error code:

data.name: EmailSendingToContactList_ContactListMustNotBeEmpty
data.value: There are no contacts in the contact list

data.name: GenericErrorWithErrorCode
data.value: An error occurred. Error Code:

data.name: GenericErrorWithRetryPrompt
data.value: An error occurred. Please try again.

data.name: ContactDoesNotExistInContactList
data.value: The contact does not exist in the contact list

data.name: ServiceLimits_InvalidEmailInterval
data.value: The selected service limit interval for sending emails is invalid

data.name: DailyEmailAnalytics_DateMustBeInPast
data.value: The selected date is in the future. Select today or a date in the past to see an email-analysis for that date.

data.name: SearchContactListsByEmail_InvalidEmail
data.value: The email address is invalid

data.name: ContactList_UnsubscribeTokenEmptyQuery
data.value: We could not find the contact list you're trying to unsubscribe from. Please click the unsubscribe link in the email again.

data.name: ContactList_UndoTokenNotFound
data.value: An error occured. Please try to click the link in the email again.

data.name: ContactList_UndoTokenExpired
data.value: You unsubscribed more than 2 weeks ago. If you want to undo your unsubscription you have to sign up to the contact list again.

data.name: ContactList_NotFound_UndoUnsubscribe
data.value: The contact list you're trying to subscribe to could not be found. It might have been deleted since you unsubscribed.

data.name: ContactList_AddContact_ContactAlreadyExitsts
data.value: This contact has already been added to the contact list.

data.name: GenericValidationError
data.value: The request is invalid

data.name: FailedToGenerateEmailBodies
data.value: An error occurred while generating the email. Please try again.

data.name: NewsletterGroupsCleanupCampaign_OverlappingCampaigns
data.value: The cleanup campaign could not be started, as it would overlap with an existing cleanup campaign

data.name: NewsletterGroupsCleanupCampaign_NoNewsletterGroups
data.value: The cleanup campaign could not be started. No newsletter groups were found

data.name: NewsletterSubscriberNotFound
data.value: We could not find a newsletter subscriber via the link you followed. Please try again

data.name: NoActiveCleanupCampaign
data.value: There are no active newletter cleanup campaigns at the moment. Maybe your link has expired.

data.name: CleanupCampaign_CannotDeleteActiveCampaign
data.value: You cannot delete an active cleanup campaign

data.name: NewsletterConfirmationTokenExpired
data.value: The link has expired. Please sign up for the newsletter again.

data.name: NewsletterConfirmationTokenAlreadyConfirmed
data.value: You have already confirmed your subscription to the newsletter

data.name: RecipientNotFound
data.value: We could not find someone with that email address in our system

data.name: NewsletterRecipientNotSubscribedToAnything
data.value: You are not subscribed to any newsletters

data.name: NewsletterUnsubscribeTokenInvalid
data.value: The request is not valid. Please reopen the page from the link in the email and try again

data.name: NewsletterUnsubscribeTokenExpired
data.value: The link you followed to get here has expired. Please create a new request if you want to unsubscribe from a newsletter

data.name: NewsletterUnsubscribeTokenAlreadyUsed
data.value: You have already unsubscribed

data.name: NewletterUnsubscribedNoResultAfterFilteringActiveRequests
data.value: You've already tried to unsubscribe within the past week. Please use the link in the email we have sent to you
